pages.text: $(l)Obtaining:$() The knowledge to craft these mystical artifacts is long lost to the sands of time. Iridescent orbs can only be found the various ruins, temples, and other settlements that dot the countryside. Try checking loot chests! Some traders have a few for sale too.
$(o)Thousands of truths echo across its surface. Magical energy pours out of an iridescent orb; use it to upgrade magical focuses.$()
